thread.title: Ted Saad
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Ted Saad

author: Ted Saad
title: Ted Saad
text: There are so many places to order equipment from but I don't even think about it. First of all B and H has the best prices. Secondly, their customer services is next to none. They are truly amazing and always willing to help you out of a bind or help you pick the best product. I can't say enough how amazing they are!!! Thank you
